comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Copy few offline map zipped files to osmdroid folder 2. Run mapviewer When i used osmdroid-android in my project with offline maps, MapTileFileArchiveProvider eats a lot of memory for each zip archive, sometimes 0,5 MB of memory for each zip file. When i cross 6MB of memory, application begin throwing a lot out of memory exceptions. The main memory eater is at org.osmdroid.tileprovider.modules.getZipFileArchive line 26; return new ZipFileArchive(new ZipFile(pFile));
